snippet: The month-long odyssey straight north through the ice showed signs of gathering steam this week as images taken by the United States Coast Guard tracked the vessels' progress.
abstract: The month-long odyssey straight north through the ice showed signs of gathering steam this week as images taken by the United States Coast Guard tracked the vessels' progress.
lead_paragraph: As my colleague William Yardley reports, the coastal town of Nome, Alaska, is anxiously watching its frozen waters for an emergency shipment of fuel being brought by a Russian tanker escorted by an American icebreaker.

headline.main: Images From a Russian Tanker's Icy Journey to Alaska
